item.title: Assortment of black bin bags dumped., 6th August
item.description:
At least 8 black bin bags have been dumped in the rear carpark of Sovereign House. Several black bin bags full of clothing, have been opened by a couple and strewn around, at the back of St Domingo House, a regular fly tipping spot.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Europe Road, Charlton Riverside, Woolwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bins not collected at 140 Whiston Road, 6th August
item.description:
The bins have not been collected for several weeks at Eleanor Court, 140 Whiston Road and are overflowing - we are having a severe fly and neighbour has seen rats. Please collect ASAP.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whiston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several large and deep potholes, 6th August
item.description:
These pot holes have been here for many months and have gradually deteriorated getting deeper and deeper. They are a hazard to the public, both pedestrians and motor vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Farm Road, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflow water leak, 6th August
item.description:
Been going on for weeks now overflow from side of building large puddle across the walkway the noise of the constant dripping when you walk past you get splashes of dirty water & you have to walk through the puddles as it’s unavoidable
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glimpsing Green, Upper Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on Lassell St again, 6th August
item.description:
2 fly tipped overflowing bins that have been left in the same spot near the Pilates Studio on Lassell St since the end of June have now been joined by a discarded enormous buggy and other rubbish. A lot of rubbish was removed from here a few weeks ago but because the bins were left there people keep dumping stuff in the same spot. Please remove everything.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 77, Orlop Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
